snippet: Lawmakers and their staffs are taking more free trips financed by special interests.
abstract: Editorial lambasts members of Congress for taking more free trips financed by special interests in 2014 than in any other year, all while accomplishing little in way of legislation; says lawmakers have defended trips as necessary for fact-finding; contends that Congress members should appeal to taxpayers to finance these efforts, move that might result in such trips actually being spent working.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers and their staffs are taking more free trips financed by special interests.

headline.main: House Job, Comes With Free Travel
headline.print_headline: House Job, Comes With Free Travel
